meanings.definition: A tropical American plant of the lily family, with poisonous seeds.
meanings.sent1: The sabadillas in the garden have beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent2: Farmers grow sabadillas for their unique appearance.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the sabadillas for nuts!
meanings.sent4: Her words were like sabadillas, beautiful but with a hidden danger.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the sabadillas' seeds, they may look harmless but are toxic.

meanings.definition: The dried ripe seeds of the sabadilla plant, used as a source of veratrine.
meanings.sent1: The medicine contained sabadillas to help with the illness.
meanings.sent2: The herbalist used sabadillas in their remedies.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally added sabadillas instead of spices to the dish!
meanings.sent4: His ideas were like sabadillas, potent and impactful.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the sabadillas filled the room, signaling their effectiveness.
